titleStmt.title: Christ in the clouds, or Gods comming to iudgement A short treatise, very necessary in these euill and dangerous times, for all those which desire that the day of the Lord, may be their day of ioy.
Christ in the clouds.
titleStmt.author: Warner, John, fl. 1635.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coles, at the vpper end of the Old-Baily, neere Newgate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
